title: Tianjin begins city-wide testing after at least two local Omicron cases detected
content:
1. Tianjin begins city-wide testing after at least two local Omicron cases detected  Reuters
  2. China Reports Nation's First Community Spread of Omicron  Bloomberg
  3. Chinese city of Tianjin to test 14 million people after Covid outbreak  The Guardian
  4. Tianjin seals off 29 residential units after detecting two local COVID-19 cases  Global Times
  5. Covid tests ordered for 14 million in China's Tianjin  Bangkok Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 天津市、少なくとも2件のオミクロン感染者を検出し、全市的な検査を開始
天津在发现至少两例本地奥米克朗病例后开始在全市范围内进行检测
天津在發現至少兩例本地奧米克朗病例後開始在全市範圍內進行檢測
